lines.text: you will go home, and we will die. We live invisible lives, we die invisible deaths.
What do you expect us to do about that? Hmm? Watch you die?
If we must die, yes, I want you to watch us.
If we're ever to find a way out of this mess, we have to start by telling each other the truth.
People don't abandon their homeland for no reason.
What sort of world are we making?
What if they are poor because we are rich?
so's everybody else. It's a hard world.
Some parts of the world are harder than others!
